title: Standalone Blazor WebAssembly authentication very slow
body:
Using AddOidcAuthentication and linking to AWS Cognito service resulting in a huge delay between start of the auth process and redirecting to AWS for sign in. This appears even using a very vanilla Blazor app and add in support for authentication as per Microsoft Docs. Looking to see if anyone else I experiencing this issue and or workaround/fix?

Json options very simple

  "OidcProviderOptions": {
    "Authority": "https://cognito-idp.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/eu-west-XXXXXXXXX",
    "ClientId": "CLIENT_ID"
  },

Auth process initially throws an error due to 'X-Frame-Options' to 'DENY' imposed by Cognito. There then follows a 10 second delay before it redirects to the login screen - no other requests present during that time.
